ing: 1 head red cabbage, cored and shredded
des: "I used to get this salad at my Grandmothers favorite restaurant. The longer it sits the better it gets."
ins: In a bowl, mix the canola oil, red wine vinegar, sugar, salt, seasoned salt, pepper, and onion powder. Place the cabbage in a large glass bowl. Pour dressing over cabbage, and toss to coat. Cover, and refrigerate 8 hours, or overnight, stirring occasionally. Drain before serving.
